title: Pset_ProfileArbitraryHollowCore
description:
This is a collection of geometric properties of hollow core section profiles of precast concrete elements, to be used in conjunction with IfcArbitraryProfileDefWithVoids when profile designation alone does not fulfill the information requirements.  

In all cases, the cores are symmetrically distributed on either side of the plank center line, irrespective of whether the number of cores is odd or even. For planks with a center core with different geometry to that of the other cores, provide the property CenterCoreSpacing. When the number of cores is even, no Center Core properties shall be asserted.

Key chamfers and draft chamfer are all 45 degree chamfers.

The CoreTopRadius and CoreBaseRadius parameters can be derived and are therefore not listed in the property set. They are shown to define that the curves are arcs. The parameters for the center core are the same as above, but with the prefix "Center".

DraftBaseOffset.title: DraftBaseOffset
DraftBaseOffset.description: Draft base offset of the profile.

DraftSideOffset.title: DraftSideOffset
DraftSideOffset.description: Draft side offset of the profile.

CoreBaseHeight.title: CoreBaseHeight
CoreBaseHeight.description: Core base height of the profile.

CoreMiddleHeight.title: CoreMiddleHeight
CoreMiddleHeight.description: Core middle height of the profile.

CoreTopHeight.title: CoreTopHeight
CoreTopHeight.description: Core top height of the profile.

CoreBaseWidth.title: CoreBaseWidth
CoreBaseWidth.description: Core base width of the profile.

CoreTopWidth.title: CoreTopWidth
CoreTopWidth.description: Core top width of the profile.

CenterCoreSpacing.title: CenterCoreSpacing
CenterCoreSpacing.description: Center core spacing of the profile.

CenterCoreBaseHeight.title: CenterCoreBaseHeight
CenterCoreBaseHeight.description: Center core base height of the profile.

CenterCoreMiddleHeight.title: CenterCoreMiddleHeight
CenterCoreMiddleHeight.description: Center core middle height of the profile.

CenterCoreTopHeight.title: CenterCoreTopHeight
CenterCoreTopHeight.description: Center core top height of the profile.

CenterCoreBaseWidth.title: CenterCoreBaseWidth
CenterCoreBaseWidth.description: Center core base width of the profile.

CenterCoreTopWidth.title: CenterCoreTopWidth
CenterCoreTopWidth.description: Center core top width of the profile.
